title: Take Back Your Power 2013 Documentary NTSC RETAIL DVD ISO
description:
Transparency advocate Josh del Sol takes us on a journey of revelation and discovery, as he investigates "smart" metering and questions corporate practices of surveillance, extortion and causing harm in the name of "green".

Smart Meters are new wireless electric, gas, and water utility meters.  Utility companies are installing these devices without consent from homeowners, often forcing their way onto private property, or shutting off service to customers who don't want the new meters.  The meters record and transmit your activities in real-time, allowing power and other companies to know when you are home, what you are doing in the house by looking at the signature of the electric loads, when you have guests, when you sleep, when you go to work, etc.

It gets worse, because countless people are getting ill from the meters.  They pulse high levels of RF radiation continuously all day, every few seconds.  Millions and millions of people in North America and Europe are fighting against these smart meters, the violation of privacy, the ill health effects of the untested and unproven technology, and the fact that companies are bullying their customers - the consumers.

Utility companies hold a monopoly, and so unlike other industries where you have competition, they think they can get away with strong-arming and bullying their customers.  Are we going to let them?


Support the film by purchasing at: www.takebackyourpower.net
